title: Items I never see being used
body:
{{item:3124}} {{item:3050}} These 2 items i never see get used never i mean like maybe once in 1000 games i would really like Riot to either change them Buff them or remove them with some other items

Edit.

I think it would be Great if they just cleaned them all up gave them some new Passivs and some other stats so we could still have {{item:3124}} and {{item:3050}} but with some changes

Edit.

This was allso to put an eye on some of the items we forget that can still be good on some champs ;)

replies.body: i love how the recommended build for sona has {{item:3050}} but every time i see it im like nope

I see {{item:3050}} now and again. I build {{item:3124}} every time I have the slightest excuse, but that hasn't really happened since I played Hybrid {{champion:110}} mid. Which I don't really do anymore . . .
Teemo and Kayle used to build {{item:3124}} all the time!  I think Jax used to build it, too.
I think Jax still might. Kayle usually does, I think; that's fair. Teemo . . . I think that's a bit to hybrid-y for him. He usually benefits more from just straight AP or straight AD, doesn't he?

Yes.  However, back in 2010ish, people didn't realize that Teemo was best as AP, and it was actually considered bad to build Teemo AP.  You wanted AD or hybrid.  However, this was before Nasher's Tooth was an item.

Since i started playing again (about 12 months ago), I haven't seen anyone build {{item:3124}}

for Teemo you actually went AD (full ADC) or on hit with a madreds bloodrazer (% max heath on hit) and wits end. 

but this was a time where AP nidalee was trash since "you only had her Q". AD splitpush nid was meta.
And Rammus was good.  When I started playing again, I was shocked at how bad he was in the meta.  Cinderhulk is changing that a bit, though.
Rammus just got his taunt nerfed hard. He has always been a good pick as long as he had a 3 second lockdown. Who wouldn't?
rammus, shaco, and morgana were the permabanned. oh have the times changed.
Amumu was permabanned, too.
Ah, okay. I started about when you did, so this makes sense. Thanks.
It was good on jax before Botrk was an item.. now he has far better options (trinity, botrk, hextech gunlade)
I've also built {{item:3050}} on {{champion:44}} since its useful for my ADC who could use it but I still wish that he kept some of that AD I had to build with it...
You know, I never see anybody build DFG anymore...
please dont remove{{item:3050}} it is core on my lee sin support
I only build {{item:3050}} if I'm support or jungle and we have mainly AD on our team. Never seen {{item:3124}} unless someone was like sure Idk what to build anymore.

> [{quoted}](name=Eraest97,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oGIgVLek,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-04-28T16:02:21.650+0000)
>
> I only build {{item:3050}} if I'm support or jungle and we have mainly AD on our team. Never seen {{item:3124}} unless someone was like sure Idk what to build anymore.

When I go hybrid Kat Rageblade is one of my core items.

Merc scim is very strong on kat, and her AD ratios are still very high.

Krit Kat>Hybrid/AP

The shunpo AA reset with {{item:3087}} and a crit will destroy almost any squishy.
Hmm I'm going to have to try this one out :D
I buy Rageblade on Jax if I am really fed. The combo with Hextech Gunblade is beastly. They should maybe buff its stats slightly. 40 Attack Damage and 45 Ability Power would be nice.

{{item:3050}} is decent on support Ashe or Pantheon
{{item:3124}} with {{item:3115}} and {{item:3085}} is decent on some hybrid AA champs (like Kayle and teemo)  but tbh there are just more efficient items than rageblade so I'd really only build it if behind.

At full stacks + passive, Rageblade is really gold efficient. On Kayle or Jax it gives you that "boss mode activated" status at half health. I would build it as a "win more" item though. If you build it while losing, people will rage at you in chat lol. "Omg look at this Jax's build, report."

it is really gold efficient but not really slot efficient, hence why I'd build it if behind :P

people rage at me for my builds anyways, whatcha gonna do? *shrugs*

Everyone talking about Jax building Rageblade, but no one mentions just how GOD TIER it is on someone like Xin Zhao.

{{champion:5}} You had turrets? Not anymore.

I literally forgot rageblade was an item

Why would they remove Atmas but keep rageblade lmao
Or remove Executioners Calling when I have Aatrox's and Mundo's spamming their laughs in this tank meta as they heal for ridiculous amounts and do tons of damage.
I see {{item:3050}} at least on occasion.  I haven't seen {{item:3124}} since I played back in 2010.

just due to this thread, i wanted to make {{item:3050}} work. 

{{champion:21}} support uses it pretty decently when there is a talon/zed mid. {{item:3050}} and {{item:3071}} to shred the entire enemy team with your ult while buffing your ADs to do even more damage. You gotta have a pretty tanky top and jungle to survive this meta though. and you have to ignore the urge to build full damage.

Herald is possibly the best item you can buy on a tanky engage support or jungler. It provides SO much damn utility, now that the aura also gives AD.

I'd love to see it get a little AOE heal or something tacked on to it, but as it stands, Herald is an incredible boost to your ADC's power in lane.
i use zekes when i play thresh on an all AD team...... doesnt happen that much

This was just a post i felt like sharing when we lost the dfg i was really sad there was no reason to remove it just give it a difent ability. Why do we have to get rid of items if we dont replace them, like if you try and click on the ad and the armor items in the menu there are none they removed the last one there was what if you dont wana lose that extra ad or some offensiv item for a ga or a banshe and you just want some armor its just sad i feel like they focus to much on the tank items than the offensiv

{{item:3056}} {{item:3512}} 

dont forget those
i like building rage blade on akali sometimes and its standard on kayle but idk who else would build it. {{item:3056}} i rarely see this item unless im building it
its cus it was mainly made for tanks and support to have somthing to (tank) the towers so the adc could take them out in like a base race or a backdor ;)

i go {{item:3124}} on jax on some games if im a dedicated splitpusher. {{item:3078}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3026}} to round it out. 

ive also went {{item:3124}} then full tank if i know im behind and cant get the trinity.
the only time ive ever used either of those items is {{item:3124}}  on Kayle in aram and {{item:3050}}  one time on soraka.
Guinsoos is good on Kayle, Zekes is good on Support Ashe. Thats it.
I get {{item:3050}} on {{champion:22}} support.
haven't really seen zz'rot portal{{item:3512}} played either

I'll get {{item:3050}} as a support sometimes if my team is 4/5 AD... but honestly there are better items :/
I'd love to see a change for it

I build {{item:3050}} once and a while either on tanks or support, if you have a lot of auto attack based champions it's great to have, they don't even need to be all AD, {{champion:131}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:4}} all benefit from the passive life steal even if they don't normally build it. SO it's kind of like building {{item:3190}} if you have a {{champion:3}} on the team and they are double AP.


 {{item:3124}} is more of a niche thing for hybrids, it might benefit from a buff, but there aren't that many champions that it would fit well on to begin with, maybe they could add an active similar to sword of the divine onto it or something.

I actually build zekes when i play support sometimes.  It's really good if the enemy team is tanky and you have 3 or 4 ad champs.  The extra lifesteal and and ad helps deal with thornmails.  The 20% cdr is awkward when combined with other support items though. I usally end up with at least 45% if i build zekes.
{{item:3512}} R.I.P. CDR and turret bombers
Play that on Heimer!!!
Looks like I gotta bring back my Rageblade Annie.

Agreed its sad to see the number of posts and legitimate suggestions that have been made for either items, and never receive an answer regarding any further changes, or word that their looking into it.
Just becaue they don't reply doesn't mean they aren't working on it.  There are too many posts to reply to all of them.  Know that they see just about everything posted on here.
